summary: A collection of general-purpose helper modules that support Litellm's core functionality, including asynchronous adaptation of blocking calls, streaming management, token counting, duration parsing, exception normalization, provider inference, request validation, logging, redaction, mock data generation, and rule-based validation.
business_intent: To provide a robust, reusable utility layer that simplifies integration with various LLM providers, ensures consistent error handling and logging, enables safe and efficient streaming and async workflows, and enforces data validation and privacy across the platform.
